outputs.output_descr:
The objective of the project will be to strengthen capacity for sustainable land management at the individual and institutional level and to mainstream sustainable land management concepts into national development strategies and policies.  The outputs associated with this project are:-
Output 1:  Sustainable Land management mainstreamed into national development policies, pland and regulatory frameworks.
Output 2:  Individual and instrutional capacities for sustainable land management developed.
Output 3:  Capacities for knowledge managemnet in support of sustainable land managment developed.
Output 4:  Investment planning and resource mobilisation for implementation of sustainable land management interventions elaborated.
Output 5:  Adaptive Management and Learning.

project_descr: CAPACITY BUILDING AND MAINSTREAMING OF SUSTAINABLE LAND MANAGEMENT IN ST. LUCIA.
